name: places/ChIJQ8ViuHRZwokRPq1DF_khjy8
formattedAddress: 11 W 42nd St 28 Floor, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 11 W 42nd St 28 Floor, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text: Versace has very poor customer service.  I purchased an item and never wore it.  I returned it, because there policy say they accept all returns.  They rejected my return and the item still had tags on it.  I was rejected a refund.  The rep said, “even if it has one hair on it, we can’t accept it.”  That is ridiculous! This is a multi billion dollar company with the worse customer service!  You’ll do better ordering from Amazon!

originalText.text: This is the worst customer service ever I ordered 2 Versace robes April 2,2021 Paid for next day delivery was supposed to receive it April 5 never came never left FedEx warehouse in Memphis Tennessee. Versace tells me they can’t refund me money until they hear back from FedEx now it’s April 27 still no robes nor my refund. They Basically told me forget that I bought robes for me and my girl for our trip that we left to go on April 11 and returned on the 16. This is very unfair you hold people my hostage like this. That’s your carrier fix that with them n make you customer happy.

originalText.text: Wish I could give zero stars.  I purchased a gift online and the recipient never got it.  A snotty customer representative told me I would have to wait until they found it.  I said just ship another item.  They said no. I would have to let them find the lost item even though I paid for it already.  Unbelievably poor customer service.

originalText.text: Customer service is TERRIBLE - they apparently do not handle all types of claims and you will not receive updates on your claims in a timely fashion, if at all. I have been trying to receive an update since my own incident on January 1st, 2021, and still have not received one. I have sent emails weekly, and the last email reply (which was now over 3 weeks ago) said they will send an update "within 5-7 business days". Customer service does not stick to their word, which is deeply disappointing, and they do not even deserve one star. It is important to put this company on display for their lack of compassion/understanding for someone's incident - especially when it is an incident involving my own personal information at a store.

originalText.text:
Horrible! Since zero stars not available!

They held retuned item for over month and took multiple follow ups for them to issue refund! In addition they charge sales tax on items exempt from tax in NJ when asked they couldn’t give me answer why, simply stated: we just do. I’m reporting to NJ division of taxation.

Since the sale of the company to MK it’s been pretty bad experience. Sticking with other designers instead.
